title: Firefox 3 RC1
author: VD
content_html:
Those of you using beta versions of Firefox 3 should feel free to go ahead and download the first release candidate now. It seems to be a bit snappier than Beta 5; it’s certainly loads better than Firefox 2. And if you’re still using Microsoft IE as Sitemeter reports that 36 percent of you are, for the love of all that’s good and holy and/or evolved by natural selection, switch over already!

Mozilla Links has a full review.
